body:
I have not found a specific component that it could define the SRI [calculated](http://www.usgbc.org/resources/lawrence-berkeley-national-laboratory-sri-calculator) according to ASTM E 1980 using values for reflectance and emissivity. [Here](http://www.usgbc.org/glossary/term/5590) for a more complete definition. 

So I have some questions:

1) Can you confirm that there isn't a specific component in LB or HB that can calculate the SRI? If so,why the SRI is not considered? Have you in mind to consider it in future release?

2) There is someone that developed a .gh model able to assess the SRI?



Francesco
